alert.note: Alert for Androscoggin; Interior Waldo; Kennebec; Knox; Lincoln; Sagadahoc; Southern Somerset (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 03 at 7:18PM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...Showers with locally strong winds will impact portions of Kennebec, northwestern Waldo, east central Androscoggin, southeastern Somerset, northwestern Lincoln and north central Sagadahoc Counties through 815 PM EST... At 717 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a line of gusty showers along a line extending from near Norridgewock to near Turner. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lewiston, Augusta, Waterville, Fairfield, Gardiner, Oakland, Thorndike, Turner, Pittsfield, Skowhegan, China, Litchfield, Clinton, Belgrade, Farmingdale, Manchester, Hallowell, Liberty, Palermo and Winthrop. This includes the following highways... Interstate 295 between mile markers 45 and 51. Interstate 95 between mile markers 89 and 147. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Androscoggin; Interior Waldo; Kennebec; Knox; Lincoln; Sagadahoc; Southern Somerset
